N = int(input())
L = list(map(int, input().split()))
L.sort()

if L[0] + L[1] > L[-1]:
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")


n = int(input())

l = list(map(int, input().split()))

if max(l) < sum(l) - max(l):
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")

N, M = map(int, input().split())
print(N * (N - 1) // 2 + M * (M - 1) // 2)
